content: thanks to bronwyndp who spotted some errata -- i ve updated the pattern 11/29/2011 i ve been gone from ravelry from a while while there was lots of life happening and came back to find lots of people had found the pattern and were making mittens for wee ones to enjoy i wrote the pattern almost entirely because i couldn t find one and my son then about a year old needed mittens the other reason i wrote it was to give my mommy brain something to do to stay sharp while i took a break from school i m glad people are getting use out of the pattern
